additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
24.5 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Butterfly
description: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
tips: If someone in your team already has evasion like Phantom Assassin or another Butterfly, decide if increasing evasion will be a good idea as the enemy team will generally rush a Monkey King Bar. The more evasion a team has, the more valuable Monkey King Bar gets for the enemy team. However, if the enemy team is greatly suppressed and underfarmed, increasing evasion could be a good decision.
